description: The day is finally here, Selaco from Altered Orbit Studios has now entered Early Access so you can see what absolute insanity they've been able to do with the GZDoom code.
title: Selaco is now in Early Access - one of the best shooters I've played in forever

description: Inspired by classics like Heroes of Might and Magic, developers Oxymoron Games (Project Hospital) have revealed their sci-fi strategy game Silence of the Siren has a fresh upgraded demo and release date.
title: HoMM-like sci-fi strategy game Silence of the Siren has a new demo and release date

description: With a demo available now and a release window revealed for sometime this Summer, Gourdlets looks like a really sweet and chilled game to try out with Linux support.
title: Gourdlets is a chilled sandbox game about building towns for cute vegetable folks

description: Oh wow, a birthday present just for me huh? The Garden Path from carrotcake and Mooncat Games is now going to release on July 30th.
title: Cozy gardening slice-of-life sim The Garden Path arrives July 30

description: I know there's quite a lot of Path of Exile fans here, especially as it works so well with Proton on Linux PCs and Steam Deck. Sounds like Path of Exile 2 is going to be a whole lot better too.
title: Path of Exile 2 will have couch co-op, cross-play and cross-progression

description: Valve stealthily put out a Release Candidate for testing the next stable update to Proton for Linux PCs and Steam Deck with Proton 9.0-2.
title: Proton 9.0-2 has a Release Candidate ready for testing on Linux PC and Steam Deck

description: Both God of War Ragnarok and Until Dawn are coming to Steam finally, but they will annoyingly require a PlayStation Network Account despite being single-player games.
title: God of War Ragnarok and Until Dawn coming to Steam, requires PlayStation Network Account
